Articles.Content: Upcoming game from The Irregular Corporation called "Mars Horizon" that is pretty much a straight rip-off of KSP minus the Kerbins. Just thought you folks might want to look into it.

19 minutes ago, Jerokhna said:

Upcoming game from The Irregular Corporation called "Mars Horizon" that is pretty much a straight rip-off of KSP minus the Kerbins. Just thought you folks might want to look into it.

I saw the trailer for this, it's nothing like KSP except that it has space in it. Gameplay isn't really the same at all, graphics are different, heck you can't even really build the rockets. Mars Horizon isn't really anything like KSP, and b/c KSP doesn't hold a monopoly on space, there is no way that there could be any IP infringement.
